command: INSERT INTO football.standings (league_id, season, team_id, rank, "group", points, played, wins, draws, losses, scored, conceded) VALUES (%s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s);

commands.select_command: SELECT * FROM football.standings WHERE league_id = %s AND season = %s;
commands.insert_command: INSERT INTO football.standings (league_id, season, team_id, rank, "group", points, played, wins, draws, losses, scored, conceded) VALUES (%s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s);
commands.update_command: UPDATE football.standings SET {} WHERE league_id = %s AND season = %s AND team_id = %s;
